Translations.Text: He Who has ordained (the implementation of) the Quran on you will certainly bring you back to the place of return (Mecca). Say, “My Fosterer knows best him who comes with guidance and him who is in clear error.”
And you had not expected that the book would be communicated to you. (It is nothing) but a mercy from your Fosterer, therefore never be a helper of the infidels
and let them not turn you away from the signs of Allah after they have been sent down to you, and invite (people) towards your Fosterer and do not be of the polytheists

And do not pray along with Allah, to any other (presumed) god, there is no god except Him. Everything will perish except His Person, His is the judgment and towards Him will you be returned. (R 9, P 19 ¾)
Do human beings think that they will be left alone because they say, “We believe,” and they will not be tested
And We did test those before them, that Allah may definitely know (mark out) those who are truthful and definitely know (mark out) the lairs
Do those who do evil think that they will escape Us? Evil is that which they judge
Whoever expects to meet Allah, let (him know that the end of) the term (fixed) by Allah will certainly come, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing
And whoever strives, he strives only for (the benefit of) his own soul. Allah is certainly Independent of the worlds
